subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hamstrung by the handiwork of previous regimes, Phil Jackson appears determined to wait it out until the summer, when the Knicks will dip well below the salary cap and finally have money to spend.
snippet: Hamstrung by the handiwork of previous regimes, Phil Jackson appears determined to wait it out until the summer, when the Knicks will dip well below the salary cap and finally have money to spend.
